entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `#pragma warning disable` for analyzers triggers IDE0079 inappropriately #76106
    17.13
  • UnscopedRef can be different in interface implementation, leading to ref safety holes #76100
  • IDE0031 doesn't account for "is not null" #76093
    Backlog
  • Support rewriting `string.Remove` in IDE0057 "Use range operator" #76091
    Backlog
  • Enumerators fails to set state to "after" in various scenarios observable with `GetEnumerator()` #76089
    Backlog
  • Synthesized delegates allow ref safety holes on the boundary of old and updated rules #76087
  • IDE0301 code fixer in ternary expression produces invalid C# code (CS0029) #76085
  • Area - Formatting - 5 #76084
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0301 wrongly alters the collection type of ICollection<T> property. #76092
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 false positive when using GetType() #75424
    17.13
  • "Unmerged changes" should use merge markers to mark refactoring conflicts across multiple targets #74366
    17.13
  • C# completion offered for explicit static interface method declaration generates code with several issues #70458
    Backlog
  • Explicit interface member completion doesn't work with params collections #72224
    Backlog
  • [IntelliSense] Suggest names of remaining explicitly implementable members after dotting an implemented interface without typing the return type #75435
    Backlog
  • Analyzer to simplify LINQ expressions by using an overload that accepts a Func<TSource,TResult> #75845
    Backlog
  • Diagnostic suppressor seems to work only for open files #75291
  • Action `Convert to full property` generates erroneous code for semi-auto properties #75547
    17.13
  • SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync not returning references used as base constructor #73704
    Backlog
  • `IDE0004` false positive when `object` is cast to `dynamic` #71695
    17.13
  • Reference highlight doesn't highlight references/usages of type aliases #74384
    17.13
  • Support `ExperimentalAttribute.Message` #75221
    17.13 P2
  • Customizable Exclamation Mark (!) Color in C# #75125
  • Reference highlighting doesn't work for some types from constructor expression #74803
  • Code action "Allow unsafe code in this project" has no effect #74472
    17.13
  • Deconstruct receiver ref escape is not considered #75850
    17.13 P2
  • Load Roslyn Analyzers from VS #74941
    17.12
  • OrganizeDocument: ArgumentException: The specified SnapshotPoint is on a different ITextSnapshot than this SnapshotPoint. #74594
    Backlog
  • "Use Collection Expressions" suggestion still appears even with multiple target frameworks, including those that target C# versions without support for collection expressions #75807
  • Allow Source Generation based on down stream project references #75703
  • All Quick Actions should have assignable shortcuts #75693
  • Suggested changes to VS2022 shortcuts (highly recommended) #75691
  • Comment option in the settings in VS VB #75686
  • Searching for References should have a simply UI button that excludes references from unit test projects #75685
  • Empty lines removal 1,2,3,4, #75656
  • Refactoring shows doubled "Preview, fix all in" links #75633
  • `readonly` modifier recommended on non-fields inside non-struct types #75625
  • Make `langword` a first-class citizen attribute of the `<see />` tag #75597
    Backlog
  • Regression in .NET 9 RC2: IDE0052 reports false positive with source-generated method #75483
    Backlog
  • Go to definition opens metadata instead of source file for project reference #75480
  • [Code refactor proposal] Split/merge multiple attributes into/from separate attribute lists #75411
    Backlog
  • [New API] IsIterator field on DeclarationModifiers type #75388
  • Make fixer for `CS0535` smarter when implementing `IEnumerable<T>` #67023
    Backlog
  • Add "Copy Error Message Text" button to syntax error popups in the Visual Studio text editor #75131
  • Provide a means to automatically generate declarations for out parameters to a method #75130
  • Collapse to Definition when loading a file #75129
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio unable to suggest "using static" expressions as quick fix #75127
  • Setting to fully qualify automatic imports of missing 'using' directive #75124
  • borders for selected reference #75123
  • Syntax highlighting missing from just the active C# file in a Visual Basic project on second vertical document group when solution opened #75109
  • [Feature] Collapse multiple leading #pragma lines #74897
    Backlog
  • Should collapse separate comment blocks separately #74816
    Backlog
  • Advanced analysis options are unreliable, confusing and poorly documented #74788
  • Sourcelink does not debug merged partial classes #74787
    17.13
  • Usage of Activator.CreateInstance won't show in references on the constructor, so there is misleading info! #74774
  • "Find All References" does not find all the associated references of namespaces #74718
    Backlog
  • Go To Definition stops working #74756
  • Created Template Item not duplicated exactly when added #74717
  • Refactor "Move type to file" should re-evaluate file header template #74703
  • False positive IDE0001 when using extern alias #74681
  • Quick info stopped working #74644
  • Go to Definition doesn't work sometimes, and I have to retype the symbol to make it work #74631
  • Go to definitiion not working. #74621
  • Code issues #74614
  • Implement generic interface method with `allows ref struct` constraint #74605
  • c# - Renaming a field can cause it to rename the same word in the comments in other files in the same project that are completely unrelated #74577
  • MS.CA.LanguageServer depends on MS.VS.Telemetry via Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Remote.Workspaces #74568
    17.13
  • typeof(T) and "using OfficeOpenXml.FormulaParsing.Excel.Functions.Text" #74528
  • Replacement param for obsolete method #74522
  • Code Search should display namespace of types found #74521
  • Improvement for refactoring IDE0046 "Convert to conditional expression" using null coalescing #74516
    Backlog
  • Adding `_` (discard) in front of evaluation auto-completes to first symbol name match for `_` (underscore) #74473
    17.13
  • Go to definition is not consistent with C# compilation when a symbol is missing #74443
  • See squigglies in #if'd code but Quick Actions don't work. #74438
    Backlog
  • Syntax highlight is half broken in both VS 17.10 and VS 17.11 P3 #74422
  • Hovering over a method gives the wrong overload #74418
  • `ref` modifier keyword is missing from completions for `ref struct` primary constructor parameter definition #74386
  • Visual Studio 2022 error list doesn't show errors from build failures in Build + Intellisense view #74380
  • Autocomplete (Intellisense) doesn't work correctly in project that references another project which has source generated files #74368
  • IntelliCode-suggested completions don't escape keywords properly #74253
  • Suppress No Longer Showing in Error List #74228
    Backlog
  • Rename 'class1' to 'Class1' lingers after IDE1006 fixer #74217
  • Add IL Viewer for .NET languages #74080
  • Add string to NameOf option in intellisense #74079
  • Automatic class initialization scaffolding #74078
  • Add assembly version information to method tooltips #74077
  • [Bug] IDE0058 not work #74073
  • Compiler chooses params span overload in expression trees leading to errors #73743
    17.13
  • Task List filtering for current project doesn't work as expected #73983
  • [Bug]: Code fix `Convert to regular constructor` generates incorrectly for class without body #72340
    Backlog
  • PostProcessChangesAsync(Document, CancellationToken) is not called anymore #73957
    Backlog
  • Test performance regression between 4.8 and 4.9.2, still there in 4.10 #73956
  • `Remove unused using` showing up multiple times in lightbulb #73893
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Inserting Duplicate "Option Strict On" in VB.NET Class files #73827
    Backlog
  • Enable argument wrapping code fix for collection expressions #73826
    Backlog
  • Please add support for colorizing c# code that happens to be in raw string literals. #73822
  • Version 17.10.0 Preview 5.0 - Error list not showing all warnings #73801
  • Error list goes crazy while doing a refactoring #73800
    18.0
  • Method defining line move when adding code before method declaration #73799
    Backlog
  • Adding/Removing space when toggling line comments #73796
    Backlog
  • Adding documents to a VisualStudioWorkspace in a subfolder fails if folder doesn't exist #73783
    Backlog
  • Account for partial properties at existing use sites of partial method symbol APIs #73772
    Backlog
  • Allow manually forcing a refresh of the IntelliSense database #73693
  • Move more logic from the Controller.Session down to the SignatureHelpService #73678
  • C# needs a feature to "Show all called methods" for any given method implementation. #73669
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Account for always true/false patterns in control flow analysis #76109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect codespit of xml doc comments #76108
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Flatten SourceMethodSymbol hierarchy #76107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update runtime async format to use methodimpl #76105
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - Runtime Async
  • Set state of enumerator object to "after" during disposal #76090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update config data for 17.13P2 snap of VS #76088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not offer to simplify a set to a collection expr when assigning to a non-set interface #76096
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove integration test project to unblock dev inner loop #76104
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Do not remove cast that would change what runtime type a virtual method dispatches to #76102
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use git conflict markers when we cannot merge text #76099
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support selector pattern simplification in linq queries #76086
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Preserve existing accessor bodies when converting from an auto prop to a full prop #76103
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update FindRefs to find constructor references in a primary constructor base type #76097
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue offering to remove an necessary cast to dynamic #76098
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix FAR on an alias to a predefined type #76101
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support ExperimentalAttribute.Message #76060
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Reduce allocations from NamedTypeSymbol.AddOperators usage #76082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • [vscode] Fix failing official builds #76071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Sort Usings in Inline Diff #74645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'implement interface' to forward explicit members to implicit ones #76044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix 'create constructor' with types without bodies #76083
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add a helper to determine if a type has a specific attribute or not. #76053
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Honour users' settings as a starting point for Razor formatting #76066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump versions of dependencies coming from maintenance-packages #76076
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, untriaged
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use partial analysis results to filter out analyzers that need to be executed. #76062
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 architecture to roslyn #76064
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update package versions and remove unnecessary EOL package references #76073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Draft] Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
